snippet: A handful of notable acts appearing at CMJ, including Savages, a new London rock quartet; and Angel Haze, a young rapper already signed to a major label.
abstract: Musical acts from around the world, including the rapper Angel Haze and the bands Savages, Flume and Merchandise will perform at the CMJ Music Marathon.
lead_paragraph: A handful of notable acts appearing at CMJ, including Savages, a new London rock quartet; and Angel Haze, a young rapper already signed to a major label.

headline.main: Six Hopefuls Worth Watching at the CMJ Music Marathon
headline.print_headline: A Music Marathon to Whet Appetites
